channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Persistent heat wave in the U.S. expected to shatter new records as it bakes West and swelters in East
item.description: LOS ANGELES — A long-running heat wave that has already shattered previous records across the U.S. persisted on Sunday, baking parts of the West with dangerous temperatures that caused the death of a motorcyclist in Death Valley and held the East in its hot and humid grip.

item.title: Hundreds of millions at risk from Chinese shopping app malware
Here’s the exact date the UK will start to sizzle under an incoming ‘heat dome’
item.description: The country’s been battered by some truly hideous weather lately. That’s about to change.

item.title: Royal Family's escape to Balmoral will be ‘carefree’ break from ‘one heck of a year’
item.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales have a busy summer ahead of them, but one location could hold the key to their recuperation after 'one heck of a year' claims royal expert

item.title: Watch: Man uses eye socket strength to break two Guinness World Records
item.description: A Las Vegas man who works as a sideshow artist broke a pair of eye-popping Guinness World Records using the strength of his eye sockets.

item.title: Persistent heat wave in the U.S. expected to shatter new records as it bakes West and swelters in East
item.description: LOS ANGELES — A long-running heat wave that has already shattered previous records across the U.S. persisted on Sunday, baking parts of the West with dangerous temperatures that caused the death of a motorcyclist in Death Valley and held the East in its hot and humid grip.

item.title: Russian authorities detain suspect over St. Petersburg cafe blast
Games Inbox: Worrying the PS6 will be a flop, Nintendo games on PC, and GTA 6 vs. Call Of Duty
item.description: The Monday letters page gets angry that Elden Ring: Shadow Of The Erdtree only got 9/10, as one reader asks about the legacy of Tomba.

item.title: The Radford family pay emotional tribute to ‘bravest girl’ who lost seven-year cancer battle
item.description: Sadly, after her seven year battle with cancer, Sophie Walker passed away over the weekend (Saturday, July 6) her devastated family have confirmed.

item.title: Woman wins $220,000 from lottery ticket printed by mistake
item.description: A Nebraska woman scored a $220,000 jackpot from the Nebraska Lottery's Pick 5 drawing with a ticket that was printed by mistake.

item.title: Tropical Storm Beryl expected to make landfall in Texas as hurricane
item.description: Tropical Storm Beryl is expected to make landfall on the Texas coast as a Category 1 hurricane early Monday, accompanied by a life-threatening storm surge and damaging winds, U.S. forecasters said.

item.title: READ: Trump indictment related to hush money payment
Arsenal set deadline to sign Bologna defender Riccardo Calafiori
item.description: The Gunners are closing in.

item.title: People are only just discovering name for popular loading icon – and they're stunned
item.description: People on X, formerly Twitter, were left completely mind-blown after discovering the actual name for one common symbol on the computer – so did you know about it?

item.title: Look: Mystery emu found wandering loose through Pennsylvania neighborhood
item.description: A Pennsylvania police department is trying to find the owner of an unusual escaped pet found wandering loose -- an emu.

item.title: Tropical Storm Beryl expected to make landfall in Texas as hurricane
item.description: Tropical Storm Beryl is expected to make landfall on the Texas coast as a Category 1 hurricane early Monday, accompanied by a life-threatening storm surge and damaging winds, U.S. forecasters said.

item.title: Trump pleads not guilty to 34 felony counts
Lottery winner still working as midwife 10 years after becoming millionaire
item.description: She still even lives in the same house she owned before.

item.title: 'I got addicted to dangerous viral beauty trend – now I want to warn others'
item.description: WARNING: SENSITIVE CONTENT BELOW: Kseniya Didik, 21, from Russia spoke out about falling into 'looksmaxxing' - a social media trend which involves drastically changing your physical appearance

item.title: Watch: Large, Argentina-native rodent on the loose in Colorado park
item.description: Wildlife officials in Colorado are attempting to track down a long-legged South American rodent seen wandering loose in Lakewood's Bear Creek Lake Park.

item.title: A top House Republican requests interview with Biden's physician
item.description: The Republican chair of the House Oversight Committee on Sunday requested that President Joe Biden's physician appear for a transcribed interview about the president's medical evaluation.

item.title: The haunting Masters meltdown that changed Rory McIlroy's career
item.description: Slumped on his club, head buried in his arm, Rory McIlroy looked on the verge of tears.

item.title: BBC plan special programmes to pay tribute to Michael Mosley one month after tragic death
item.description: They will celebrate his legacy.

item.title: Meghan Markle warned to be careful about one key thing if new brand is to succeed
item.description: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, has teased the launch of three products from her new brand, American Riviera Orchard, and has been rumoured to be launching a fourth

item.title: Grandma's advice earns Md. man a $50,000 lottery prize
item.description: A Maryland man said some wisdom imparted to him by his grandmother led to his winning a $50,000 lottery prize.
